scripts.docker: docker run --name my-express-app -v myexpressapp_dcsync:/dcsync -v %cd%:/.src -p 3000:3000 -e DCSYNC_TARGET=/app -it --rm my-express-app /dcsync/exec npm run
scripts.docker-debug: docker run --name my-express-app -v myexpressapp_dcsync:/dcsync -v %cd%:/.src -p 3000:3000 -p 5858:5858 -e DCSYNC_TARGET=/app --rm my-express-app /dcsync/exec npm run remote-debug
